title: EP004 Non Fungible Tokens on Cardano & Interview with Patrick Tobler from NFT-Maker.io
blurb: This episode we'll explore the NFT craze that has hit the Cardano Blockchain. We have a look at our own NFT project and talk to the creator of NFT-maker.io, Patrick Tobler, and get some insights from him in regards to NFTs and how is website makes creating NFTs so easy that a 4 year old can create them.
